metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. • Heat a non -stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. • Pour the egg mixture into the skillet. • Cook, stirring gently, unt il the eggs are set but still soft. • Serve immediately.

• In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. • In another bowl, combine buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract. • Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. • Heat a non -stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it. • Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake. • Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown. • Serve with syrup and your favorite toppings.

• 1 cup all -purpose flour • 2 tablespoons sugar • 1 teaspoon baking powder • 1/2 teaspoon baking soda • 1/4 teaspoon salt • 1 cup buttermilk • 1 large egg • 2 tablespoons melted butter • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
• In a blender, combine banana, frozen berries, Greek yogurt, and milk. • Blend until smooth. • Pour into a bowl and top with granola, fresh fruit, nuts, and seeds.

• In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. • Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides. • Heat a non -stick skillet over medium heat and melt the butter. • Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides. • Serve with syrup and powdere d sugar.
